name: Inhuman Reflexes
description:
Here is my first game ! I hope you'll like it ! I made it using Unity and Adobe Photoshop in 1 weeks ! :)  Get better reflexes and  point and click skills after playing this game ! It's a simple 2D game shooter which contains 2 main modes (for now):
  • -The Normal mode: just shoot and get the highest score.
  • -The NoShoot mode: You can't shoot but the enemies dies when they collide with each other.
Controls:
  • -Moving: ZQSD, ARROW KEY
  • -Shooting: LEFT CLICK, LEFT CONTROL
  • -Shield: RIGHT CLICK, LEFT ALT
(You can turn on the fullscreen mode by cliking to the button in the corner of the game)

Released the 07/29/2018
